reviewText: I got the ex rated version so my gf and I could get into it. The still don't have live intercourse or show anything
This video is better than average, but not as good as the videos that are directly related to the excellent "Red Hot Touch". But Jaiya is a great sex teacher so it's worth the money.

The into isby Jaiya, and she does a very good job of explaining things.  Jaiya is also the narrator for the various positions.  We actually learned something from Jaiya's intro, but the postion visualizations were a bit mechanical, and we quickly lost interest.  We never did get through all the positions, as my step-son managed to borrow the DVD before we could do so!
